title: Australia v India: men’s first one-day international – live
summary: The summer cricket season kicks off with the first ODI at Optus Stadium in Perth. Martin Pegan will provide live updates throughout the match. Fans can follow the action as it unfolds.

title: Australia news live: October heat records broken in WA; police use pepper spray on Melbourne protesters
summary: Please provide the specific news article or details you'd like summarized, and I'd be happy to help!

title: Italian blasphemy and German ingenuity: how swear words differ around the world
summary: Researchers are re-evaluating the perceived significance of taboo words, previously considered indicators of low intelligence. They argue that these words possess a unique "power" and impact that has been overlooked. This shift in perspective highlights the complex role that taboo language plays in communication and societal dynamics.

title: ‘The loss of education is the loss of the future itself’: Gaza’s children and teachers on two years without school
summary: Nearly all schools in the area have been destroyed or damaged, leaving 600,000 children starting their third year without formal education. Three students and a teacher express their personal experiences and aspirations amid the ongoing crisis. Their stories highlight the resilience and hope for a better educational future.

title: Should friendship really be a ‘one strike and you’re out’ deal?
summary: The trend of ending friendships over minor mistakes has gained traction in recent years. It's essential to acknowledge our own imperfections and understand that everyone errs. Maintaining relationships requires empathy and a willingness to forgive.
